Package com.eclipsesource.tabris.camera

Interface Camera

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.rap.rwt.client.service.ClientService, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CameraImpl
    public interface Camera
extends org.eclipse.rap.rwt.client.service.ClientService

    The Camera component can be used to take and receive pictures from a mobile client's camera. The taken picture will be sent to the server side and a callback will be called. See CameraListener. An instance of Camera can be accessed using RWT.getClient().getService( Camera.class ).

    Since:
    0.8
    See Also:
    CameraListener, CameraOptions, Client
    No Implement:
    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCameraListener​(CameraListener listener)
      Adds a CameraListener to get notified about image events.
      void removeCameraListener​(CameraListener listener)
      Removes a CameraListener.
      void takePicture​(CameraOptions options)
      Instructs the client to open the camera.

    • Method Detail

      • takePicture

        void takePicture​(CameraOptions options)

        Instructs the client to open the camera. The added CameraListeners will be called when the user has taken a picture..

        Parameters:
        options - The options that should be used as the configuration for taking a picture. Must not be null.
        See Also:
        CameraListener

      • addCameraListener

        void addCameraListener​(CameraListener listener)

        Adds a CameraListener to get notified about image events.

      • removeCameraListener

        void removeCameraListener​(CameraListener listener)

        Removes a CameraListener.
